note:
Hi, I'm Bridget a 40 year old mom of 3, with two cats and married to a wonderful woman.

I'm a big fantasy and sci-fi (and secret third thing) book nerd. I'm also an aspiring writing who's written tons of stuff that will never see the light of day.

My biggest active hobby is miniature painting, though I'm drifting away from war games and starting to like painting larger scale models and busts and have also started to get (back?) into regular ol' painting on a canvas.

I work in tech, but you won't hear me talking about that beyond whining about my job. The closest I'll get is my mostly dormant retro computer hobby.
